tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ProcurementReports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_name VARCHAR(255),
  report_date DATE,
  department_id INT,
  total_spend DECIMAL(10, 2),
  cost_savings DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE Suppliers (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  supplier_name VARCHAR(255),
  supplier_location VARCHAR(255),
  contact_person VARCHAR(255),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE vendors (
   id UUID,
   name VARCHAR,
   location VARCHAR,
   contact_email VARCHAR,
   phone_number VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE procurement_vendors (
  vendor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vendor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  vendor_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE procurement_products (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  product_category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  unit_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE procurement_orders (
  order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vendor_id INT NOT NULL,
  product_id INT NOT NULL,
  order_date DATE NOT NULL,
  quantity INT NOT NULL,
  total_cost DECIMAL(12, 2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE procurement_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE NOT NULL,
  report_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  report_content TEXT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE procurement_currencies (
  currency_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  currency_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  exchange_rate DECIMAL(10, 6) NOT NULL
)
